name: Path M Cystic Duct/Gallbladder
title: Pathologic M
notes: **Note:**  Para-aortic and pericaval lymph nodes are classified as regional nodes for TNM 7 staging and are coded in regional lymph nodes.
rows:
Distant lymph node(s) including:
    Peripancreatic (along body and tail of pancreas only) 

Distant lymph node(s), NOS
 
Carcinomatosis

Distant metastasis WITH or WITHOUT distant lymph nodes

Distant metastases, NOS

Stated as M1
